text: Do you give to charities?
Yes I sometimes give to charities. How about you?
I do, one of if not my favorite is Save The Children.  With that one I know exactly where the money is going.
It is always very important to know where your money is going. I donate both time and money to a charity called Food back packs for kids. It is very rewarding.
I do know that Save The Children is very active with the situation in Syria.
Oh really? I haven't really paid much attention to charities that do thing outside our own country. I prefer to help here at home first in my community.
That is fair too, they help in situations all around the world.  Home is important too though.
There are just so many people to help everywhere it can be kind of overwhelming. It's important to give to all kinds of organizations when we can.
That is true, I think people forget that the price of a cup of coffee here can be a weeks worth of food elsewhere

Yeah that is definetly a hard thing to wrap my head around. I have to stop and remind myself many times that even on what I may consider my worst day, there are people who live through worse every day. Do you ever volunteer your time at any charities for kids?
I help out at the local Goodwill 2 or 3 times a year, and kids benefit from that so I would say yes.
That's good. I really enjoy helping kids, its rewarding to see things from their perspective. And refreshing.
I agree, kids give an honest view of the world and this can be very refreshing.  And we need to help them.
Yes, changing the cycle of poverty is something desperately needed. Even if just one child is helped to see that they are more than what their circumstances have to offer its a win.
So would you be willing to donate a share of your bonus to Save The Children? The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
I would possibly be interested in donating some of it. I would like to know more about it before I donate.
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.  There is a website  URL
thank you for the info. I would donate a portion of the bonus
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.  I myself am giving 0.25.
I Think 0.25 is a good amount
Fantastic, thanks a lot!  This is a great cause, thank you!
My pleasure glad I can help in some way.
